docs.snippet: Stanley Greene, a founding member of Noor Images who covered global conflicts with unblinking honesty, has died in Paris.

docs.snippet: Ted Russell spent time with a young Bob Dylan in New York. As a lifelong jazz fan, he was unimpressed. So were a lot of editors, until the nasally voiced folk singer became a star.
